sentence.text: The contiguous deletion of Wnt signaling pathway and its neighbouring genes, MAOA/B and cellular response to leukemia inhibitory factor, reportedly leads to syndromic clinical features such as microcephaly, intellectual disability, and epilepsy.

entity.text: cellular response to leukemia inhibitory factor

sentence.text: This familial study demonstrates that a deficiency in one of two MAO genes may not lead to psychomotor delay, and deletion of cellular response to leukemia inhibitory factor may not cause epilepsy.

entity.text: cellular response to leukemia inhibitory factor
